Subjects: Christ, prayer to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A simple prayer to Jesus — four lines

BodLye30.Transcription:
Ihesu for thi blysfull blodbryng thoo soulus in to thi blysof
                    whom I haue had eny good& spare that thei haue doon amys
BodLye30.Note: At the end: ‘Quod I T V O S E H’.
BodLye30.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
         83 (1965): 35-47: 37-8.
